1:
God stands in heaven in a meeting of all the spirits whom he has placed in charge of what he created.\q2 He tells them that he has decided this:
\q1
2:
"You must stop judging people unfairly;\q1 you must no longer make decisions that favor wicked people!



\q1
3:
You must defend people who are poor and orphans;\q2 you must act fairly toward those who are needy and those who have no one to help them.
\q1
4:
Rescue them from the power of the wicked people!"


\q1
5:
Those rulers do not know or understand anything!\q2 They are very corrupt,
\q2 and as a result of their corrupt behavior,
\q2 it is as though the foundation of the world is being shaken!



\q1
6:
I previously said to them, "You think you are gods!\q1 It is as though you are all my sons,
\q1
7:
but you will die as people do;\q2 your lives will end as the lives of all rulers end."



\q1
8: God, arise and judge everyone on the earth\q2 because all the people groups belong to you!
